evidence.text: The Court should set aside NIH’s unlawful blacklisting policies—and the actions taken to implement those policies—and compel the review of applications that the agency has unlawfully withheld.

extracted.value: Set aside NIH’s unlawful blacklisting policies

evidence.text: V. Declare pursuant to 28 U.S.C. §2201 that 2 C.F.R. §200.340(a)(2) (2020) and 2 C.F.R. §200.340(a)(4) (2024) do not independently permit or authorize termination of awarded grants based on agency priorities identified after the time of the Federal award;

extracted.value: Plaintiff: Declare that 2 C.F.R. §200.340(a)(2) and 2 C.F.R. §200.340(a)(4) do not permit termination of awarded grants based on agency priorities identified after the time of the Federal award
